title: Monhang Component Manifest
description: Schema for monhang component configuration files (JSON and TOML formats)

name.description: Component name (used as directory name). If not provided, derived from the repository URL (e.g., 'repo' for /path/to/repo.git, 'foo' for host.xz:foo/.git)

version.description: Component version (semantic versioning with optional 'v' prefix)

source.description: Source repository URL with optional query parameters for version and type. Supports both standard URLs (git://, https://, etc.) and SSH format (git@host:path)
